Subject: Purge stale records
Description: Is there a way or process we can run daily to purge any client records that checked in that no longer check in? We want to have up to date reporting.
Next_Steps__c: Provided steps. Now waiting for customer feedback.
Solution_Comment__c:
Provided below steps:

1. Please go to Device Control -> Computers.
2. Select Filters.
3. Set Status = Offline and Apply.
4. Re-arrange the Last Seen column - so it shows the oldest ones first.
5. Select the checkbox in front of Computer Name to select that entire page of computers:
6. From the bottom of the page select Delete.
